resources.string:
Tableahead V1 by
Travis Shirley,
Luke Tatarsky,
Joshua Hop Hing,
Ethan Rody, and
Yehonatan Katz
Enter a restaurant name for search
Select restaurant to book table for
No available tables found. Try another time slot.
Too early store not yet open
Are you sure you want to delete?
Check if your password is long enough and your email is valid

Welcome\n\nWelcome to tableahead! In this tutorial, we will cover how to use the app. You can press \"Next\" for the next part of the tutorial, \"Back\" to view the previous message, and \"Close\" to exit it.

Help Screen\n\nFirst, we will go over this screen, the Help Screen. You can access this screen either by tapping on the question mark icon on the top left of the screen, or by tapping on the \"Help\" button sometimes located in the same place. Here, you can of course tap \"Tutorial\" to view this tutorial. You can also view version information about the app by tapping \"About\".

Toolbar\n\nThe toolbar you see at the top of the screen has 4 buttons. You already know about the \"Help\" button. The \"Bookings\" button lets you view bookings you have already placed. The \"Search\" or Home button brings you to the main page of the app, the search screen. Lastly, the account icon button brings you to a page where you can manage details about your account, such as your name.

Search Screen\n\nThe search screen allows you to look for restaurants that you want to book tables at. You begin by tapping a button that allows you to choose how you want to search. If you are searching by name, you enter the name of the restaurant you wish to search for into a textbox, then tap \"Search\". If you are searching by category, you can add or remove categories you wish to search for by tapping them on the relevant part of the screen. You can also tap on categories to see more info on them. If you are searching nearby, you can enter how far you would like to search. Once you have completed your search, you simply tap on the table icon to view bookings for a restaurant. You can also change the sort type by tapping \"Distance\" in the top-right of the screen. You may also tap on the stars/ratings icon to view ratings for a given restaurant.

Booking a table\n\nAfter tapping on the table icon in the search results screen, you will be shown tables for the next possible time slot. You can change details for your booking by tapping on the button with the time and date. After doing so, simply choose your desired table and confirm your booking. You will then be presented with the menu screen.

Menu Screen\n\nTo select what you want to eat during your visit, simply tap on the plus sign icon for each item and press \"Order\" when finished. You can then review your order and remove any unwanted items, add more items, or confirm your order. You can also add a note to your order. Confirming will bring you to the Booking Overview screen.

Booking Overview Screen\n\nOn this screen, you can edit all the details of your booking. Simply press the relevant button and you will be able to edit your order in the requested manner. When done, you can confirm or delete your booking.
User Bookings Screen\n\nOn this screen, you can view any bookings you have already placed and edit them via the Booking Overview screen.

Account Screen\n\nOn this screen, you can edit various aspects regarding your account details. Simply tap on the relevant part of your account you wish to edit, then fill out the textbox at the bottom of the screen and tap confirm. Make sure passwords meet Google password requirements and email addresses are legitimate. Please note, you cannot change your email without verifying your current email. You can also add a phone number to your account if you wish. Adding it is similar to editing other parts of your account. Lastly, you can also sign out of the app by tapping \"Sign Out\".
